name: Tesseral
long_description:
Tesseral is the open-source auth infrastructure for B2B SaaS.

We provide everything a B2B SaaS company needs to power an enterprise-ready login experience, including:
* A beautiful login page that requires no code to configure
* Authentication methods from 'Login with Google' to SAML SSO
* Enterprise directory sync (SCIM)
* Transactional emails
* Multifactor authentication (MFA) with passkeys and authenticator apps
* Self-service settings pages for your customers
* User, organization, and session management
one_liner: The open-source auth infrastructure for B2B SaaS
